end-actions.enrolment-instruction: Copy the numbers below and enter them on the enrolment page of Access Adelaide.

steps.welcome: Welcome to MyTimetable! With this tool, you can easily schedule your timetable before enrolment. We highly recommend using a computer or tablet to get started.
steps.search-course: Choose a subject area, search for a course, and click ‚ÄúAdd‚Äù to include it in your timetable.
steps.calendar-dnd: Scroll down to see the calendar with your enrolled courses. You can drag a class and drop it in one of the highlighted boxes to change its time.
steps.change-week: Change the calendar week to see more classes.
steps.course-details: Click your enrolled course to see details of your enrolled classes.
steps.course-modal: If you encounter any class clashes when using MyTimetable, you can open the modal to change the class.
steps.ready-button: Once you are satisfied with your class times, click the "Ready for Enrolment" button at the bottom of the calendar.
steps.access-adelaide: You can easily enroll in courses on Access Adelaide using the class numbers shown in the modal.

toast.drop-to-change-term: You need to drop all courses to change the term
toast.too-many-courses: 8 courses for a term is crazy! üíÄ
